name: baseball in the bottom of the 9th inning
name_original: baseball in the bottom of the 9th inning
description:
title- baseball story

platform-  HTML

Genre- text based adventure

rating- E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

instructions: download the html file in order to play

game design team: Joshua Flores

Game Overview: you must save this game of baseball for your team as the closer. it is the bottom of the 9th and your team is winning 3-0 but the opposing team has bases loaded and no outs. you will choose different choices that will end up having different choices and endings afterwards
